## geras.Renderer.init() method

Initialize the renderer. Geras has a highlight provider in addition to the normal constant provider.

**Signature:**

```typescript
init(theme: Theme, opt_rendererOverrides?: {
        [rendererConstant: string]: any;
    }): void;
```
